messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

investigate dial sent wednesday re almost there issue with findings session your input needed know if you were having particular issues friday evening but had poor connection belgrade tried dial serbian number connect macedonian number rang rang pick up number connect regards sent re almost there issue with findings session your input needed apologies thought had replied cannot go back senior exec prospect or customer ask them help test our had another example friday where senior exec client dial copenhagen said permanently busy or unobtainable can only suggest we try replicate by test dialling into some meetings mobile phone externally can advise how you replicate doing other countries know if any other ideas or suggestions was also call client was having issues with thanks
